    • attemptAddViewer

      public Optional<PacketBlockPlayerData> attemptAddViewer(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean sendUpdate)
      Attempts to add a viewer to this Packet Block. This will check to see that the Player matches all ParsedCondition's. The Optional will be empty if the player doesn't match one of the view requirements.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to attempt to add as a viewer
      sendUpdate - Whether to send a block update packet to the Player
      Returns:
      An Optional that is either empty or contains PacketBlockPlayerData

    • addViewer

      public PacketBlockPlayerData addViewer(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Add a viewer to this Packet Block. NOTE: This bypasses any view requirements that are set.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to add as a viewer
      Returns:
      The PacketBlockPlayerData instance
